ok
how to install java in my ubuntu?it is installed by default?
uname -r will tell you the kernel if its 64 bit or not
and any cpu less that 4 years old can run 64 bit
its 32 bit optimized for intel cpus
go to Tools > addons > (Last tab with the lego piece) and disable it from there
yes i got that, thank you, ubuntu should not include so many useless plugin in those auto searches.
